description:
TV Fanatic caught up with the cast of The Originals at 2013 San Diego Comic-Con, where Joseph Morgan, Claire Holt, and Phoebe Tonkin dished on what we can expect in terms of romance and supernatural parenting.TV Fanatic网站在2013圣地亚哥动漫大会上遇到了《初代吸血鬼》的主演Joseph Morgan、Clair Holt和Phoebe Tonkin，他们透露了这部正在筹备的科幻剧的一些剧情。

We can’t even begin to imagine what Klaus will do to protect his child, particularly because Morgan claims Klaus is still the antagonist, and he won’t be softening anytime soon.我们简直无法想象Klaus会怎样保护自己的孩子，特别是在有敌人存在的情况下，短时间内Klaus的日子过的不会太轻松。

What he will be doing, however, is thinking up baby names. Morgan’s suggestion? Beetroot Cyborg Mikaelson.Klaus还会给孩子绞尽脑汁地想个名字。Morgan想Klaus的孩子叫什么名字呢？他觉得Beetroot Cybrg Mikaelson这个名字就不错。

Tonkin, on the other hand, didn’t have any baby names in mind just yet. Rather, she was more focused on the dangerous situation Hayley will find herself in during pregnancy.而Tonkin似乎完全没有把心思花在给她们的孩子取名字上。她更多的注意力放在了Hayley怀孕期间的危险处境上。

In terms of romance, Phoebs sees Klaus and Hayley as protective parents, but nothing more. We’re sure Klaroline fans would agree.说到感情，Phoebe认为Klaus和Hayley会是那种会保护自己孩子的父母，不过他们的情感仅此而已。相信这是KC党们愿意看到的。

title: 《初代吸血鬼》：Klaus会成怎样的爸爸？
